{{Stub|Basic Gameplay overview}}
'''Energy Amplifier''' is a [[:Category:Recurring Events|recurring]] [[event]] in ''Genshin Impact'', in which the [[Traveler]] assists the [[Sumeru]] scholar [[Hosseini]] in investigating an ancient relic known as the Energy Amplifier.
